LighterFluid.title: Lighter Fluid
LighterFluid.desc: Discard every hex in your hand. Deal 30 damage for each hex discarded.

DanceShoes.title: Dance Shoes
DanceShoes.desc: Perform a swap. Inflict Burning on both tiles swapped.

BurningBracers.title: Burning Bracers
BurningBracers.desc: Gain 1 AP and deal 30 damage. Has Quickdraw if more than 9 tiles are burning.

CausticCastanet.title: Caustic Castanet
CausticCastanet.desc: Persist: Destory an adjacent burning tile to gain 2 AP next turn.
